physics_models.name: Solar Energy Conversion
physics_models.coding_directives: def calculate_energy(output_power, efficiency, area):\n    return output_power * efficiency * area
physics_models.python_code: def calculate_energy(output_power, efficiency, area):\n    return output_power * efficiency * area
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m². Temperature effects are negligible.
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

f4a0ccb1-e074-48d0-8df1-eec183b5e019.name: Battery Storage

physics_models.name: Battery Capacity
physics_models.coding_directives: def calculate_time(capacity, current):\n    return capacity / current
physics_models.python_code: def calculate_time(capacity, current):\n    return capacity / current
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant discharge rate. No depth of discharge limits.

f4a0ccb1-e074-48d0-8df1-eec183b5e019.verification_plan: Test battery capacity under various discharge rates.
